title: Christmas Eve cake
ingredients: ['3 eggs, yolks and whites separated', '660g sugar', '150g unsalted butter, room temperature', '375g plain flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '375ml milk', '100g chopped walnuts', '50g hazelnuts', '50g almonds', '50g raisins', '50g dried apricots', '100g mixed peel', 'For the icing', '1 egg white', '300g icing sugar', '1 tablespoon lime juice', 'mint leaves, glace cherries and walnuts for decoration']
